title: "Mr.Brown"
output: html_document
date: "2025-08-11"
---

```{r}
s1 = c("A1", "A2")
s1
```

```{r}
p1 = c(0.5, 0.5)
p1
```

```{r}
s2 = c(paste0("A", c(3:10)), paste0("B", c(1:10)))
s2
```

```{r}
p2 = replicate(18, 1/18)
p2
```

```{r}
tabA = sample(s1, size = 1, prob = p1)
tabA
tabB = sample(s2, size = 1, prob = p2)
tabB
combTab = c(tabA, tabB)
combTab
```
